textBox.richText: For mother’s day, we went to an Italian restaurant where we took the above picture. It was, as usual for a Sunday, a work day for the parents -- Nadia and Anton where happy to see us for a little bit. Anton is a healthy and funny little devil who loves to make funny faces and attack his dad. Sometimes Anton and Nadia put on a “show” for us where they dance and sing. For the last show we had Anton with a spider man mask and a green --glow in the dark-- wig. The pictures are [HERE} and [HERE].
